def: <grammatical particle marking genitive as well as simple and composed adjectives>
是的 shìde that's it, that's right
他是说汉语的. Tā shì shuō Hànyǔde. He is one who speaks Chinese.
看一看 kànyīkàn have a (quick) look at
一个人 yí gè rén one person
to be, 是不是? shìbushì? is (it) or is (it) not?
是否 shìfǒu whether or not, is (it) or is (it) not?
<verb particle marking a new situation or a completed action>
你来了! Nǐ láile! You have come! 我累了! Wǒ lèile! I've gotten tired! 那好了! Nà hǎole! That's OK (now)! 我只请了一位客人. Wǒ zhǐ qǐngle yí wèi kèren. I invited only one guest.
end, finish, settle, dispose of, know clearly, to be able, (=了解 liǎojiě) understand, comprehend
了了 liǎoliaǒ clearly understand, settle (a debt/etc.), to be intelligent
了了 liǎole to be over/ended/finnish/settled
你卖不了! Nǐ mài bùliǎo! You will not be able to sell (it)!
有人吗? yǒu rén ma? Is there anybody here?
没有 méiyǒu haven't, there isn't
有没有? Yǒuméiyǒu? Is there or isn't there? Have (you) or haven't (you)?
he, him, his, (she, her, it, its), (=其他 qítā) other
(in classical texts) someone else, something else
原来 yuánlái originally, as a matter of fact
above, on, over, top, (go) up, last, previous
上声 shǎngshēng 3rd tone in Mandarin
(=国家 guójiā) country, state, nation, <family name>
个人主页 gèrénzhùyè personal homepage
explain, scold, refer to, (=说话 shuōhuà) speak, say
<pluralizing suffix for pronouns and nouns referring to persons>
for, for the sake of, in order to, in this connection
do, act, act as, be, become
认为 rènwéi think or believe that...
以为 yǐwéi think or believe erroneously that...
子女 zǐnǚ sons and daughters
together, with, (F龢) harmony, gentle, mild, kind, <family name>
暖和 nuǎnhuo nice and warm
join in singing, compose a poem in reply
(Alternative feminine form: 妳 nǐ) you, your
earth, ground, soil, place, position, distance
地支 dìzhī the Twelve Terrestrial Branches
快地走 kuàide zǒu walk quickly
go out, come out, in direction out from something, emit, issue, prouce
出现 chūxiàn appear, emerge, (F齣) <classifier for operas and plays>
way, path, channel, way, say, a streak (of light), doctrine, <classifier for rivers, topics, etc.>, (=道教 Dàojiào) Taoism
领道 = 领导 lǐngdǎo leader
period, season, (=时间 shíjiān, =时候 shíhou) time, (=小时 xiǎoshí) hour
走得快 zǒude kuài walk quickly
就要 jiùyào about to (do something)
这就是我! Zhè jiùshì wǒ! This is simply me!
他就要去. Tā jiùyào qù. He is about to leave.
want, will, shall, need, important, essential
below, under, (go) down, next (as opposed to previous/last)
use, take, according to, because of, in order to
所以 suǒyǐ so, therefore, as a result
先生 xiānsheng mister, gentleman, Sir
can, able, meet, meeting, society, union, party
put in, add, (F招) make move in chess, trick, decieve
go, leave, depart (opposite of 来 lái)
<subordinator similar to 的 de>, it (in classical texts)
pass, cross, go by, exceed, <verb particle marking that someone has had the experience of doing something, that it has happened at least once>
过马路 guò mǎlù cross the street
我去过中国两次. wǒ qùguo Zhōngguó liǎng cì. I have gone to China twice.
整天家 zhěngtiānjie all day long
家里 jiālǐ (at) home, (in the) family
correct, answer, treat, agree, mutual, pair
~able, (=可以 kěyǐ) may, can, (=可是 kěshì) but, however
可能 kě'néng possible, probable, maybe
可口可乐 kěkǒukělè Coca Cola
neighbourhood, half kilometer, <family name>, (F裏,裡) in, inside, lining
后天 hòutiān the day after tomorrow
(F麼,末) (interrogative suffix) 什么? shénme? what?
为什么? wèishénme? why? 没什么! méi shénme! It doesn't matter!, Never mind!
sky, heaven, god, day, (=天空 tiānkōng) sky
(=而且 érqiě) and, furthermore, (=然而 rán'ér) yet, even so
能够 nénggòu be capable of
好好儿 hǎohāor in perfectly good condition
有没有? Yǒuméiyǒu? Is there or isn't there? Have (you) or haven't (you)?
<family name>, (F於) in, at, for, to, from, by, than

(=成为 chéngwéi, =变成 biànchéng) become, <family name>

matter, affair, thing, event, accident, job, responsibility
only, just, merely, <classifier implying "one of a pair", animals, vessels, utensils, etc.>

see, look at, read, think, consider

hand, a person skilled in something

lord, master, host, god, (=主要 zhǔyào) main, primary

like, as, as if, (=如果 rúguǒ) if
in front, previous, ago, former, first
前天 the day before yesterday
basis, origin, edition, <classifier for books, periodicals, files, etc.>

longitude (both geographic and in Chinese medecin), scripture, constant, regular, <family name>, deal with, (=经纪 jīngjì) manage (a business)

经由 jīngyóu via, by way of
易经 Yìjīng Book of Changes
head, top, first, <classifier for livestock, garlic, etc.>

grow up, chief, head, older, elder
realize, sense, inform, tell, (=知道 zhīdao) know

怎么样 zěnmeyàng how? in what way?
general, a piece in Chinese chess 麻将 májiàng mahjongg
outside, outer, other, foreign, beyond, relative on ones mother's/sisters/wife's side
(=但是 dànshì) but, still, nevertheless, however, yet
life, incarnation, <classifier for suits of clothing>, (=身体 shēntǐ) body

some, <classifier for plural or indefinite/small amount>

(=意思 yìsi, =意义 yìyì) meaning, idea, (=愿意 yuànyi) wish, desire
enter, go forward, recieve, drink, eat, submit
grasp, hold, handle, <classifier for things with handles, handfuls, chairs, etc.>
把子 bàzi, 把儿 bàr handle
(=法律 fǎlǜ) law, (=办法 bànfǎ) method
如此 rúcǐ (=这样 zhèyàng) like this
此地 cǐdì (=这里 zhèlǐ) here, at this place
circle, return, reply, turns, times, chapter, Muslim, Hui (ethnic minority), <classifier for chapters, times, etc.>

美元 měiyuán US$ 美家 měijiā artist
a drop (of liquid), dot, decimal point, a little, a bit, appoint time, select, choose, order food/drink, <classifier for small amounts>, (=点火 diǎnhuǒ) light a fire

month, (=月亮 yuèliang, =月球 yuèqiú) moon
bright, clear, distinct, next (day or year), <family name>
voice, declaration, (=声音 shēngyīn) sound, <classifier for sounds>

speech, word, language, dialect, (=说话 shuōhuà) talk, speak

take somebody's part, to, towards, all along, allways, <family name>, (F嚮) direction, towards, (F曏) formerly, previously

(=部分 bùfen) part, section, unit, <classifier for film, large books, machines, etc.>, (=部队 bùduì) troops, army
正月 zhēngyuè, 新正 xīnzhēng the 1st month of lunar year
(=名字 míngzi) name, personal name, reputation, famous, <classifier for persons with professional or prominent social identities, e.g. students, doctors, soldiers, workers>
fix, settle, calm, stable, subscribe, (=决定 juédìng) decide
female, (=女人 nǚrén, =妇女 fùnǚ) woman

equal, class, wait, and so on, etc.
small table, (F幾) 几乎 jīhū almost
